channel.title: Small Merchanting Clan
channel.description:
I know most MITBers dont really play runescape anymore but still have accounts. so while youre doing nothing with your botted mills you could make more :p theyre only small merches for now, but later hopefully bigger items. as it would be a small group of people it will be easy to manipulate the prices of items and make sure they dont crash.
general requirements are: - 2M cash (bigger profits if you have more money) - a membership
post if youre interested :) im looking for an item atm :)

item.title: Small Merchanting Clan
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

SETO:

why can’t be f2p lol, if i would love to join, i got 5mil cash plus a mask set

its too hard to make alot of money off it :s
if youre interested in the game you should try merchanting rune sets, i heard theyre not a bad f2p merch?

Read full topic

item.title: Small Merchanting Clan
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

lol
it wont start for a few weeks anyway i have exams and have gastro atm :
this also allows the grand exchange charts to settle and even out before we start because of the massive crash that occurred some items still havent regulated yet.
if anyone has any ideas of merching items suggestions are welcome.
generally we’ll be doing smaller items such as seeds rings of wealth pouches and some armours.
when everyone starts making alot of money we can do higher prices items

Read full topic

I might join in a few weeks. I’ll have around 24 million then, assuming I don’t get banned.

item.title: Small Merchanting Clan
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:11, topic:313018”][quote author=maminerr link=topic=409531.msg3025921#msg3025921 date=1257916258]

I’ll join it, as long as it won’t fail before the dump date. Question: Will ranks be dumping before the dump date, creating a ‘scam’ clan for non-mitb members? I have 29M cash and rising, plus an SGS which I probably won’t sell.

thats fine.
its for MITB only
hence why its small.
i thought making it mitb only will make it a more trustworthy clan aswell therefore no early dumping.
i have an sgs myself of which i wont be selling due to its rising but you have more then enough
[/quote]

Let me know if this starts up. You also have to be careful of people who might NOT be trustworthy and dump early, because if they have enough of the item they can manipulate the price themselves.[/quote]

yeah ive thought of that
obiously there is people who i will not let join
i wouldnt let someone who only joined mitb join because we dont know them.
cm’s mods vets and senior members are more then welcome.
im sure they wouldnt have these ranks if they were idiots

@sppt goodgood
it will take awhile to kick off, i have exams coming up and the ge charts are still very un-even
we need more members to help manipulate prices before we start merchanting.

Read full topic

i have an sgs myself of which i wont be selling due to its rising but you have more then enough :)[/quote]
